languages.text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: До начала следующего хода авангарда сам авангард и его союзники получают +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% к урону и +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} против оппонентов в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда. Кроме того, при активации {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают эффект Под защитой до начала следующего хода авангарда.{br} Под защитой (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}): Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard gains +10+2×(FEL bonus)% damage and +10+2×(FEL bonus)% armour penetration against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when the ability is cast, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following! (0 AP, 2 MP): The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}): The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: До начала следующего хода авангарда сам авангард и его союзники получают +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% к урону и +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} против оппонентов в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда. Кроме того, при активации {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают эффект Под защитой до начала следующего хода авангарда.{br} Под защитой (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}): Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}): The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До начала своего следующего хода авангард получает +(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ)% к урону и +(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ)% к пробитию брони в бою с противниками в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг себя. Кроме того, при активации способности все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают эффект Под защитой до начала следующего хода авангарда.{br} Под защитой (0 ОД, 2 ОП): Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав атаки по возможности.

До начала своего следующего хода авангард получает +(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ)% к урону и +(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ)% к пробитию брони в бою с противниками в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг себя. Кроме того, при активации способности все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают эффект Под защитой до начала следующего хода авангарда.{br} Под защитой (0 ОД, 2 ОП): Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав атаки по возможности.

languages.text: 先锋与所有盟友造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%，{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}护甲穿透{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}提高{/g}%。此效果仅对先锋周围2格内的敌人生效，持续至下个回合开始前。 此外，使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，先锋周围2格内所有盟友都会获得跟随战友！这一能力（消耗0点行动点数，2点移动点数），效果持续至先锋的下回合开始前。{br} 跟随战友！： 该盟友可以移动到任意与先锋相邻的格子，此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}与所有盟友造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%。此效果仅对先锋周围2格内的敌人生效，持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前。 此外，使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，先锋周围2格内所有盟友都会获得跟随战友！这一能力，效果持续至先锋的下回合开始前。{br} 跟随战友！（0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}）： 该盟友可以移动到任意与先锋相邻的格子，此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%。此效果仅对先锋周围2格内的敌人生效，持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前。 此外，释放此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，先锋周围2格内所有盟友都会获得跟随战友！这一能力，效果持续至先锋的下回合开始前。{br} 跟随战友！（不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}）： 该盟友可以移动到任意与先锋相邻的格子，此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno, el vanguardia y sus aliados ganan un +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de daño y un +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} contra los enemigos situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a él. Además, cuando se utilice esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, todos los aliados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia adquieren la capacidad ¡Te sigo!, con coste de 0 PA y 2 PM, hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del vanguardia.{br} ¡Te sigo!: El personaje puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente al vanguardia sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} y sus aliados ganan un +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y un +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} contra los enemigos situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a él. Además, cuando se utilice la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, todos los aliados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia adquieren la capacidad ¡Te sigo! hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del vanguardia.{br} ¡Te sigo! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}): El personaje puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente al vanguardia sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana un +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y un +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} contra los enemigos situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno a él. Además, cuando se utilice la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, todos los aliados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia adquieren la capacidad ¡Te sigo! hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del vanguardia.{br} ¡Te sigo! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}): El personaje puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente al vanguardia sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten Zuges erhalten die Vorhut und ihre Verbündeten +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % Schaden und +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die Vorhut. Wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eingesetzt, erhalten ferner alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die Vorhut bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges der Vorhut die Fähigkeit Folge!, die 0 AP und 2 BP kostet.{br} Folge!: Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges an die Vorhut angrenzendes Feld bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Vorhut erhält bis zum Beginn ihrer nächsten Runde{/g} +(10 + 2× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) % Schaden und +(10 + 2× GEF-Bonus) % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius um die Vorhut. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} gewirkt wird, erhalten sämtliche Verbündeten im Umkreis von 2-Zellen um die Vorhut darüber hinaus die Fähigkeit Folge!, und zwar bis zum Beginn der nächsten Runde der Vorhut.{br} Folge! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}): Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges, an die Vorhut angrenzenden Feld bewegen, ohne einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} zu provozieren.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} erhält bis zum Beginn ihrer nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius um die Vorhut. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} gewirkt wird, erhalten sämtliche Verbündeten im Umkreis von 2-Zellen um die Vorhut darüber hinaus die Fähigkeit Folge!, und zwar bis zum Beginn der nächsten Runde der Vorhut.{br} Folge! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}): Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges, an die Vorhut angrenzenden Feld bewegen, ohne einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriff{/g} zu provozieren.

Bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten Zuges erhalten die Vorhut und ihre Verbündeten +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % Schaden und +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die Vorhut. Wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eingesetzt, erhalten ferner alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die Vorhut bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges der Vorhut die Fähigkeit Folge!, die 0 AP und 2 BP kostet.{br} Folge!: Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges an die Vorhut angrenzendes Feld bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.

languages.text: Jusqu'au début de son tour suivant, le patrouilleur et ses alliés bénéficient de +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de dégâts et de +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} contre les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur. En outre, lorsque cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est utilisée, tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur bénéficient de la capacité Suivre ! pour un coût de 0 PA et 2 PD, jusqu'au début du tour suivant de celui-ci.{br} Suivre ! : Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case adjacente au patrouilleur sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et de +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} contre les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur. En outre, lorsque la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est utilisée, tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur bénéficient de la capacité Suivre ! jusqu'au début du tour suivant de celui-ci.{br} Suivre ! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}) : Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case adjacente au patrouilleur sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

Jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et de +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} contre les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du Patrouilleur. En outre, lorsque la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est utilisée, tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du Patrouilleur bénéficient de la capacité Suivre ! jusqu'au début du tour suivant de celui-ci.{br} Suivre ! (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}) : Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case adjacente au Patrouilleur sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

Jusqu'au début de son tour suivant, le patrouilleur et ses alliés bénéficient de +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de dégâts et de +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} contre les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur. En outre, lorsque cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est utilisée, tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur bénéficient de la capacité Suivre ! pour un coût de 0 PA et 2 PD, jusqu'au début du tour suivant de celui-ci.{br} Suivre ! : Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case adjacente au patrouilleur sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: 次のターン開始まで、ヴァンガードとその仲間は、ヴァンガードの周囲2マス以内の敵に対するダメージが+{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%となる。 さらに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が使用された時、ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、ヴァンガードの次のターン開始まで追従！(コスト：0AP、2MP)アビリティを得る。{br} 追従！： このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、ヴァンガードに隣接するマスへ移動できる。
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard and their allies gain +{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% damage and +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, when this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, all allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain the Following! ability, which costs 0 AP and 2 MP, until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.{br} Following!: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は自身の周囲2セル以内の敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}に+{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%を得る。 さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が使用された時、ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、ヴァンガードの次のターン開始まで追従！アビリティを得る。{br} 追従！ (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}): このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、ヴァンガードに隣接するセルへ移動できる。

次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は自身の周囲2セル以内の敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+{uip|DamageBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%と、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}に+{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|6d2666949acd442bac7a4ab914af0b1f}%を得る。 さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が使用された時、ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、ヴァンガードの次のターン開始まで追従！アビリティを得る。{br} 追従！ (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}): このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、ヴァンガードに隣接するセルへ移動できる。
